definitions.definition: Dedicated to a religious purpose or a god .
examples: I'm planning to visit the holy city of Jerusalem this Christmas.
This tree is considered holy in my culture.

definitions.definition: Morally perfect or flawless , or nearly so.
examples: My grandmother is a very holy woman.

definitions.definition: Separated or set apart from (something unto something or someone else). (Can we add an example for this sense?)
Set apart or dedicated for a specific purpose, or for use by a single entity or person.
Used as an intensifier in various interjections .
examples: Holy cow, I can’t believe he actually lost the race!
Those children next door are holy terrors!

main_definition: Dedicated to a religious purpose or a god .
secondary_definitions: Morally perfect or flawless , or nearly so.
Separated or set apart from (something unto something or someone else). (Can we add an example for this sense?)
Set apart or dedicated for a specific purpose, or for use by a single entity or person.
( slang ) Used as an intensifier in various interjections .
